solution_line_template: She served {num_people_served} people and they all tipped her ${tip_per_person} so she made {num_people_served}*{tip_per_person} = $<<{num_people_served}*{tip_per_person}={tips_earned}>>{tips_earned} in tips
She makes ${hourly_wage} an hour and she made ${tips_earned} in tips so she made {hourly_wage}+{tips_earned} = $<<{hourly_wage}+{tips_earned}={total_money_made}>>{total_money_made} in one hour
